seo.title: JPD - BurgerFuel Bunder
seo.description: A burger dating app that let’s you swipe through the hotties on the menu to find your perfect burger match.

pageSections.content: Burgerfuel celebrated it’s 27th Birthday and since ‘95 they’ve been the go-to destination for date nights. To kick off the Birthday celebrations we launched Bunder, a burger dating app that let’s you swipe through the hotties on the menu to find your perfect burger match and score a BurgerFuel hook up with your next purchase.
